item.title: Batch Photo Files Rename Tools (by EXIF).
item.description: Requirement Most cameras' filename are like 'DC*****' or 'P*****', I want to find a tool which has the following features. Batch change filenames to P[photo capture date]-[camera model].jpg. For example, P20220710-101405-iPhone 13.jpg. Can change the camera model string, for example, I want to change "iPhone 6" to "i6", "DMC-G6" to "G6", "DSC-RX100M5A" to "R1005A", ... Can add a serial number automatically when the new filename is duplicated with others. Softwware There are lots of rename tools.

item.title: How to Skip Podcast's Introduction
item.description: I usually use Spotify to listen Podcast, but because I use Spotify with my children, I want to find another Podcast App for my personal use. And I find Pocket Casts has a interested feature, it can skip the first or last *** seconds. It means some Podcasts have an introduction in the beginning, if you want to skip it, you can do it in this app. (This feature is provided in free version.

item.title: Use WISE to send currency exchange rate mail daily
item.description: Requirement I want to have a daily mail including currency exchange rate information. Solution use https://wise.com (no need to register an account) Connect to https://wise.com/tools/exchange-rate-alerts/ Input the currency exchange rate you want to know and your email address. Mail result You will receive the mail daily.
